Class ElasticSearchClient

java.lang.Object

public class ElasticSearchClient
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for ElasticSearch operations. Contains server connection data and methods to create a singleton

getInstance

public static ElasticSearchClient getInstance()
Returns the single instance of the ElasticSearchClient. ElasticSearchClient follows the singleton design pattern, so only one instance of the class exists.

the instance of ElasticSearchClient.
